about_the_game:
Fantasy Dreamland is a world of fantastical characters, animals, beautiful colors and monsters. Most of all, it's a world of limitless imagination where you can make your own world. Fantasy Dreamland is a DLC Series with add-on packs available to expand your worlds!

This asset pack contains everything you would need to start making your game! Make your game standout with Fantasy Dreamland!

Contents:

- Over 5.000 tiles!
- Over 500 animated tiles!
- Over 200 item icons!
- 40 character sprites!
- 35 enemies sprites!
- Grasslands, fields, caves, cliffs, desert and village tiles!
- House Interior tiles!
- Animated water, lava, stones, plants and chests tiles!
- Included auto tiles!

Important Note:

* The screenshots are only examples of the asset pack used on a game that has the entire Fantasy Dreamland collection, some of the tiles may not be included on this single asset pack and may be part of another Fantasy Dreamland asset pack

* Getting this asset pack as the first Fantasy Dreamland asset pack is highly recommended

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
